svg.text: Visual Report Layout & Development Methods Guide

g.text: Customer acquisition cost decreased by 18% while maintaining
quality leads, resulting in improved ROI across all channels.
Increase investment in digital marketing channels by 25%
Expand customer success team to maintain NPS above 70
Implement automated reporting for real-time insights
Focus on retention strategies for high-value segments
A. Detailed methodology | B. Raw data | C. Statistical tests | D. References
• Write after completing all analysis (2-4 hours)
• Highlight 3-5 key metrics with visual emphasis
• Use action-oriented language and specific numbers
• Tools: MS Word, Google Docs, Notion
• Extract data using SQL queries or API calls
• Keep to 5-7 columns maximum for readability
WHERE year = 2024 ORDER BY importance DESC LIMIT 10;
• Line charts: Time series and trends
• Highlight critical insights that need immediate attention
• Link each recommendation to specific data insights
• Prioritize by impact vs. effort matrix
• Include expected ROI or business impact
• Provide clear next steps and ownership
